articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Actual Parachuting and Striking Drill of Paratrooper Units of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Actual Parachuting and Striking Drill of Paratrooper Units of KPA
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the actual parachuting and striking drill of paratrooper units of the KPA.
					 After receiving a report on the plan for the drill on the observation post, he guided it.
					
					 The paratroopers who have undergone intensive training, their hearts burning with the resolution to mercilessly wipe out enemies, accurately landed on the designated area.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction, saying they are very good at parachuting and they have strong guts.
					
					 The paratroopers have intensified their training the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu, bearing in mind that they can not expect a victory in their future combat without sweat in the day-to-day trainings. They rapidly went over to their next combat action and thus carried out the order of the Supreme Commander.
					
					 Kim Jong Un highly praised them for having successfully conducted the drill by applying the Juche war method and gave instructions to be fulfilled by the KPA to round off the combat preparations.
					
					 He said that an army good at fighting would be unimaginable without drills and that if service personnel neglect training even a moment because there is no gunfire of war, they may bring irrevocable consequences in an actual battle. The KPA should make it part of their life and habit to do exercise, he added.
					
					 He stressed the need to prepare all service personnel as a-match-for-a-hundred fighters who are always ready for all services by thoroughly carrying out the training-first idea of the party, thinking of battles awake or asleep, while bearing in mind that an exercise means army and training is the first task among a hundred military tasks.
					
					 He put forward a new training method and way which would serve as guidelines for preparing service personnel to be capable of satisfactorily performing their combat duties.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the service personnel would firmly guarantee the accomplishment of the Juche revolutionary cause and the building of a thriving socialist nation with arms by making sustained great efforts for stepping up the battle preparations and bolstering up the combat capability.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Pyon In Son, O Kum Chol, Ri Pyong Chol, Pang Kwan Bok and Jang Tong Un.

articles.title: Kang Sok Ju Meets Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Kang Sok Ju Meets Kanji Inoki
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Kang Sok Ju, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) who is advisor to the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, had a talk with Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors of Japan, chief director of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan and co-chairman of the organizing committee of the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest, and his party Thursday.
					 Present there were Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK who is chairman of the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, and Jang Ung, chairman of the International Martial Arts Games Committee and co-chairman of the organizing committee of the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest.

articles.title: Joint Press Conference on Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest Held
articles.content:
Joint Press Conference on Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest Held
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A joint press conference on the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest was held at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Thursday.
					 Present there were Kanji Inoki, chief director of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan, and Jang Ung, chairman of the International Martial Arts Games Committee, who are co-chairmen of the organizing committee of the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest, and players from different countries who came here to take part in the contest.
					
					 Also present were media persons of the DPRK and Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan), those related to information of foreign embassies here, correspondents and reporters of different countries who came here to cover the contest.
					
					 Jang Ung said that well-known pro-wrestlers of Japan, the U.S., France, Brazil and other countries are to take part in the contest which will be held in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, adding:
					
					 The preparations for the contest have already been rounded off.
					
					 The pro-wrestlers will demonstrate their strength, conduct joint training and demonstration with junior judoists and wrestlers of the DPRK and have an opportunity to watch an art performance to be given for the participants in the contest.
					
					 Kanji Inoki said in his speech that his idea is to realize the peace in the world through sports and culture and has exerted himself for it.
					
					 Expressing belief that the contest would be conducive to realizing peace in the world by success, he extended warm greetings to the Korean people.
					
					 Questions put by reporters were answered at the press conference.

articles.title: Reception Given for Participants in Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest
articles.content:
Reception Given for Participants in Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK-Japan Friendship Association and the International Martial Arts Games Committee gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant Thursday in honor of the participants in the Pyongyang International Pro-wrestling Contest. 
					Present there on invitation were Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors of Japan who is also chief director of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan and co-chairman of the organizing committee of the contest, and his party and foreign players.
					
					Also present were Kang Sok Ju, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea who is also advisor to the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Jang Ung, chairman of the International Martial Arts Games Committee and co-chairman of the organizing committee of the contest, Pak Kun Kwang, chairman of the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, and officials concerned.
					
					Jang Ung in his speech warmly welcomed the players to take part in the contest with the desire of peace and friendship.
					
					We set store by the wishes of Kanji Inoki to promote fraternity and friendship between the peoples of the DPRK and Japan and contribute to the world peace through sports exchange, Jang noted.
					
					Kanji Inoki made an address.
					
					He expressed thanks for those relevant who made big efforts for the contest saying that the contest would produce successful fruition. 
					
					He expressed the will to make efforts for friendship between Japan and the DPRK.

articles.title: Kanji Inoki Here
articles.content:
Kanji Inoki Here
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors of Japan, chief director of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan and co-chairman of the organizing committee of the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest, and his party arrived here Thursday.
					 Also arriving here were wrestlers of different countries to take part in the contest.
					
					 They were greeted at the airport by Jang Ung, chairman of the International Martial Arts Games Committee and co-chairman of the organizing committee of the Pyongyang International Pro-Wrestling Contest, and Ma Chol Su, secretary general of the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Diplomatic Envoys of European Countries
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Diplomatic Envoys of European Countries
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong met and had a talk with diplomatic envoys of the Czech Republic, Bulgaria, Poland, UK, Germany, Romania and Sweden who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Russia Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Russia Appointed
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyong Jun was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Russia, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Vietnamese National Day Marked
articles.content:
Vietnamese National Day Marked
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Nguyen Thac Phong, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Vietnamese embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Thursday to mark the 60th anniversary of the founding of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Wan Su, Presidium member and director of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea, Ri Chang Gun, Ri Kil Song, Ri Myong San, Ko Myong Hui, So Ho Won, Ri Song Chol and other officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Vietnamese embassy staff members were on hand.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Staff Members Visit Meari Shooting Gallery
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Staff Members Visit Meari Shooting Gallery
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and his embassy staff members visited the Meari Shooting Gallery Thursday on the occasion of the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.
					 The guests looked round various places of the gallery which was built into the modern base for cultural and emotional life and spent their pleasant time, playing a shooting game.
					
					 The ambassador made an entry in the visitor's book:
					
					 I visited the gallery on the significant day of the young Korean people. The gallery is the very significant place for not only shooting fans but also the revolutionaries with the honorable mission to defend their country. I was deeply moved to look round the gallery which is associated with the profound intention of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il and respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Italian Delegation of Lawmakers Visits Various Places
articles.content:
Italian Delegation of Lawmakers Visits Various Places
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy led by Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate who is chairman of the Italia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, visited the Okryu Children's Hospital.
					 The guests looked round various places of the hospital which was successfully built into the comprehensive medical service center for children thanks to the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea for the younger generation.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm, Panmunjom, etc.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Join Young People in Marking Youth Day
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Join Young People in Marking Youth Day
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials of the DPRK joined young people in different parts of the country in celebrating the Youth Day on Thursday.
					 Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Ryong Hae, Pak To Chun, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol and officials in Pyongyang and local areas visited industrial establishments, farms and universities to congratulate the young people.
					
					 They included Kim Il Sung University, Taean Heavy Machine Complex, Mansudae Art Studio, Pyongyang University of Architecture, Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, Mangyongdae Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory, Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Sangwon Cement Complex and the Chollima Steel Complex.
					
					 The officials together with young people placed floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu, portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, mosaics depicting their images and monuments to their revolutionary activities and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round revolutionary museums, rooms dedicated to the education in revolutionary history, rooms dedicated to the history of those industrial establishments, farms and universities, worksites and classrooms. 
					
					 They met exemplary officials and members of the youth league and encouraged them, requesting them to demonstrate the honor of creators of miracles and innovations and pioneers breaking through the cutting edge on all fronts for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The young people spent the holiday, singing and dancing full of joy and optimism and playing sports and amusement games and colorful cultural events.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Squad of Youth League
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Squad of Youth League
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) - The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League gave a performance "Song of Youth Following the Sun" at the Central Youth Hall Thursday to mark the Youth Day.
					 The performance began with instrumental music and collection of songs "Song of Youth Following the Sun" and "We Are Successors to Revolution." Put on the stage were male solo and pangchang immortal revolutionary paean "Star of Korea", light music immortal masterpiece "Where Are You, Dear General?" and "March of Korean Youth", mixed chorus "Let's Defend the Party Central Committee with Our Lives" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by successfully solving the youth problem for the first time in history.
					
					 Male quartet and pangchang "Joy of the People", male chorus "We Will Hold Arms More Tightly" and other songs resounded forth. They reflected the unshakable faith and will of members of the young vanguard to advance straight and dynamically, holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Among the audience were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, officials of the youth league, officials concerned, youth and students.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students for celebrating the Youth Day took place in different parts of the country.
					 They presented dances in different places of Pyongyang including the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 They danced to the tune of "Youth Day Waltz", "Victory Will Be Won Generation after Generation" and other songs.
					
					 They were filled with boundless glory and happiness being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in the provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Korean Youth Movement Adorned with Heroic Struggle and Feats
articles.content:
Korean Youth Movement Adorned with Heroic Struggle and Feats
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The young people of the DPRK are significantly celebrating the Youth Day (August 28).
					 The Youth Day was set by leader Kim Jong Il to commemorate the inauguration of the Young Communist League of Korea by President Kim Il Sung on August 28, Juche 16 (1927).
					
					 The young Koreans have carried on heroic struggle and performed great feats in the annals of the Korean revolution, developing their movement under the deep care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They laid down their lives without hesitation for the victory in the anti-Japanese war and the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 They also took the lead in building a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence. Even in those days of the Arduous March, the forced march, they made distinguished contributions to defending the Workers' Party of Korea, the leader and the country and building a thriving nation.
					
					 Now the Korean youth movement has been put on a new stage of its development under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The young people in the DPRK are performing heroic feats in such important projects as the construction of power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River and stockbreeding base on Sepho tableland.
					
					 It is a great pride of the DPRK to have those youths who are devotedly working for the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness, true to the guidance of the WPK and the leader.

articles.title: History of Korean Youth Movement
articles.content:
History of Korean Youth Movement
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The young people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have performed heroic feats, to be recorded in the history of the country, under the loving care of the great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					 After Korea's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, the young Koreans of all social standings rallied themselves around the Democratic Youth League of North Korea (at that time), a mass youth organization, under the slogan "Patriotic Youths, Unite under the Banner of Democracy!" advanced by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They devoted their efforts and wisdom to building a new country and laid down their lives unhesitatingly to defend the country in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					
					 After the war the youth of the DPRK took the lead in the postwar reconstruction and worked great feats in every period of the revolution and construction. They finished the Haeju-Hasong railway project in 75 days as well as the construction of Ichon-Sepho railway section in time.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il attached importance to the youth affairs and encouraged the young people to perform admirable feats for the country and the nation, putting forth such slogans as "Let Us Become Reliable Young Vanguard Faithful to the Workers' Party of Korea!" and "Love the Young People!".
					
					 Encouraged by his deep trust, the young people built a number of monumental edifices including the Youth Hero Motorway.
					
					 On January 26, Juche 101 (2012), Marshal Kim Jong Un sent the young people his autographic letter reading "Prosperous Tomorrow Will be Brought Earlier by Dynamic Footsteps of Youth. Always Straight Forward, Following the Party!" to encourage them to fully display the dignity of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Inspired by this letter, the young people in the country have taken the lead in creating the Korean speed in scientific researches, sports activities and all other fields.
					
					 They are now playing an important role in building a thriving nation under the deep care and trust of the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader.

articles.title: Legal Expert on Poor Human Rights Performance in U.S.
articles.content:
Legal Expert on Poor Human Rights Performance in U.S.
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- On August 9, unarmed African-American teenager Michael Brown was shot to death by Officer Darrell Wilson, a white policeman, in Ferguson City, Missouri State, the U.S. 
					 Such serious racial discrimination in the U.S. sparked off world public uproar.
					
					 In this regard, Chae Mu Jin, a researcher at the Law Institute of the DPRK Academy of Social Sciences, told KCNA: 
					
					 Fierce anti-racism protests are now taking place in across the United States over the death of black teenager. The world public termed this catastrophic situation a civil war.
					
					 However, President Obama has taken a carefree attitude toward the case, only expressing "regret."
					
					 His attitude angered the black community and all other people in the world. Protests remain strong in more than 100 cities of the U.S. and police ruthlessly crack down on protesters, leaving some of them wounded.
					
					 But, Obama is still keeping mum about the situation in his country, though he has talked much about other countries' "human rights performance".
					
					 This clearly shows that the U.S. call for "human rights" is no more than propaganda and Obama, its boss, is just a puppet without principle.
					
					 Obama, who has refused even to remain a human being to say nothing of a statesman, slandered the DPRK over "human rights" in cahoots with traitors to the nation during his trip of south Korea.
					
					 The Korean people will never forget such behavior and surely force him to pay dear price for it.

articles.title: Trade Union Officials Hold Seminar
articles.content:
Trade Union Officials Hold Seminar
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea held a seminar on the education in Kim Jong Il's patriotism, faith, working class viewpoint and morality at the Central Hall of Workers Thursday.
					 The participants heard papers dealing with the significance and validity of the idea clarified by Marshal Kim Jong Un on the education in Kim Jong Il's patriotism, faith, working class viewpoint and morality and the issues arising in conducting the 4-point education in a unique manner among the trade union members.
					
					 The floor was taken by Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the federation, Kim Kyong Su, chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the federation, Kim Un Chol, chairman of the Cabinet Committee of the federation, Jang Kum Chol, chairman of the Academy of Social Sciences Committee of the federation, and Ri Sung Gwon, chairman of the Ministry of Railways Committee of the federation.
					
					 The speakers said that the idea advanced by Kim Jong Un on 4-point education serves as important guidelines to be held fast to in the ideological work of the federation at present, and it is the basic task of the federation to firmly prepare all trade union members to be the true patriots thoroughly applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism into practical activities.
					
					 They underlined the need to put up mosquito nets so that the imperialists' ideology and culture and alien trend of life would not be instilled into trade union members, and wage a dynamic struggle to thoroughly root out all non-socialist practices.
					
					 Trade union members should have the steadfast spirit of defending the country and turn out in the decisive struggle to resolutely shatter the moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group of traitors to ignite a new war, they noted.
					
					 The federation should dynamically conduct the 4-point education among trade union organizations and members and thus successfully perform its honorable mission as reliable helpers and defenders of the party in the general advance of the Songun revolution, they stressed.
					
					 Present at the seminar were trade union officials and members and workers.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Victims to Ukishima-maru Incident Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Victims to Ukishima-maru Incident Held
Tokyo, August 27 (KNS-KCNA) -- A memorial service took place in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture, Japan on August 24, the 69th anniversary of the merciless death of thousands of Koreans who were returning the homeland with the joy of national liberation due to the Ukishima-maru incident committed by the Japanese imperialists.
					 Present there were officials of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Korean compatriots and students, Koreans under the south Korean Residents Association in Japan (Mindan) and Japanese personages.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the victims.
					
					 Speakers stressed that they would work hard to give vent to the grudge of the compatriots who met a grievous death.

articles.title: Final Game of Soccer Tournament for Torch Cup Held
articles.content:
Final Game of Soccer Tournament for Torch Cup Held
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A final game of the soccer tournament for torch cup was held at the Yanggakdo Football Stadium on Thursday, the Youth Day. 
					 Among the spectators were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Yong Hun, Chairman of the C.C., the youth league Jon Yong Nam, officials of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, officials concerned, youth and students and Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 The final game took place between the April 25 Team and the Hwaebul Team.
					
					 The April 25 Team beat its rival 1:0.
					
					 The cup and medals were awarded to the April 25 Team.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Communications Held
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Communications Held
Nampho, August 28 (KCNA) -- The scientific and technological presentation in the field of communications took place at the Nampho City Information and Communications Center from Aug. 26 to 28.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians and officials of scientific and educational institutions including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and Huichon University of Technology, the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications and factories and enterprises in the field of communications, and three revolution team members.
					
					 Submitted to the presentation were more than 180 data which solved the scientific and technological issues arising in updating the communications as required by the developing reality.
					
					 The participants introduced successes and experience made in the efforts to thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth in the historic letter "On Bringing about New Turn in Post and Telecommunications" sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to the participants in the national meeting of officials of communications and exchanged views on the issues arising in introducing them.
					
					 Drawing attention of the participants were tens of communications equipment, devices and materials conducive to ensuring news and broadcasting services rapidly and correctly.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry Held
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry Held
Unjon, August 28 (KCNA) -- The national scientific and technological presentation in the field of veterinary science and animal husbandry took place in the Unha Co-op Farm, Unjon County, North Phyongan Province on Aug. 27 and 28.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, officials and other people in the field of veterinary science and animal husbandry.
					
					 Submitted to the presentation were tens of valuable papers made in scientific researches and production.
					
					 Highly estimated at the presentation were papers on the achievements made in settling the feed issue of domestic animals.

articles.title: New Technology for Producing Ethyl Acetate Developed
articles.content:
New Technology for Producing Ethyl Acetate Developed
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Researchers of University of Sciences in the DPRK have recently developed a new technology for producing ethyl acetate.
					 They completed a method of manufacturing new catalyst with domestic raw materials and established an ethyl acetate production process based on it.
					
					 The new technology was introduced to the Sunchon Chemical Complex, helping ensure high formation rate of catalyst and production rate of ethyl acetate and improve the quality of products.
					
					 This technology is also helpful to prolonging the serviceable life of equipment and removing air pollution as it does not need chlorides.

articles.title: Only Victory and Glory Will Always Be Set in Store for Korean Youth: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Only Victory and Glory Will Always Be Set in Store for Korean Youth: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Today is the Youth Day. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an editorial on the Youth Day sends greetings to millions of young Korean people who are enjoying their worthwhile lives in the posts for defending the country and the work sites for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 The editorial says:
					
					 The Youth Day serves as an important occasion in demonstrating the revolutionary character, organizing ability, unity and indomitable spirit of the Songun young vanguard advancing straight and dynamically under the leadership of the party while glorifying the proud history and tradition of the Korean youth movement. 
					
					 From the first period when he embarked upon the road of the revolution President Kim Il Sung regarded the youth problem as an important one related to the victory of the revolution and the destiny of the nation and led the youth movement along the most correct path. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il pursued the politics of attaching importance to the youth and loving the future, creating the contemporary example in solving the youth problem, true to the noble intention of the President. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un, possessed of the noble view on the rising generation as his inborn disposition, is successfully carrying forward and developing the idea of the President and Kim Jong Il on attaching importance to the youth and their exploits.
					
					 In the era of Kim Jong Un the ideological and mental traits of young Korean people are being put onto a nobler stage. 
					
					 Now they are devoting their all to the struggle to glorify the socialist country dignified with independence and strong with Songun as the most powerful country in the world. 
					
					 In other countries young people obsessed by luxury, vanity, degeneration and depravity bring shadow to the future of nation but in the DPRK young people are becoming the pioneers in creating socialist civilization. 
					
					 Only victory and glory will always be in store for the young Korean people advancing straight and dynamically under the leadership of the party, loudly singing the song "March of Korean Youth".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday runs an article to mark the 11th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Thoroughly Implement the Line of Economic Construction in the Era of Songun Laid Down by the Party".
					 The work, published on August 28, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the orientation and ways to be held fast to as the guidelines in economic construction, including the issue of directing all efforts to preferentially developing the defence industry, the issue of simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture to decisively improve the people's living standard and the issue of preserving the socialist principle in the economic work and fully displaying the advantages of socialist economy. 
					
					 The validity and vitality of the line of economic construction in the era of Songun put forward by the party have been clearly proved in the past 11 years, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The party's line of economic construction in the era of Songun is the line for carrying forward and developing the basic line of the socialist economic construction as required by the era of Songun and more successfully implementing it on a new high stage, and the valiant and giant line for building a thriving socialist nation to bring about unprecedented great leading forward and changes in the revolution and construction. 
					
					 Now the DPRK has favorable conditions to direct all efforts to the economic construction and the drive for improving the people's living standard on the basis of powerful war deterrence. 
					
					 The reality proves that the line of economic construction in the era of Songun for simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture while preferentially developing defence industry is the most popular line which helps bring changes in succession in the drive for improving the people's living standard. 
					
					 Greater advance will be made in the drive for building an economic power and improving the people's living standard thanks to the line of economic construction in the era of Songun laid down by the party and the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is translating the people's dream and ideal into reality.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Show Action to Mend Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Show Action to Mend Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are setting up such perfunctory mechanisms as "preparatory committee for unification" and "committee for economy and unification" and talking about "cooperation between south and north in environment, culture and people's living" and "basic plan for developing south-north relations". They went the lengths of blustering that if the inter-Korean dialogue is resumed, "it is possible to discuss any issue in which the north is interested" while persecuting and suppressing people who call for implementing the north-south joint declarations, stopping the war maneuvers against the north, lifting "May 24 step" and resuming tourism of Mt. Kumgang.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Thursday says those who do not know about the facts behind the scenes may think that the south Korean puppet authorities are working to mend the inter-Korean relations and settle the reunification issue.
					
					 It is a cynic ploy of the puppet forces to mislead public opinion by orchestrating such unfit burlesque, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 If they are truly interested in mending inter-Korean relations and settling the reunification issue, they should halt the nuclear war maneuvers against the north aimed to do harm fellow countrymen in the north in league with the U.S., to begin with.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are being deteriorated as now because the puppet forces are kicking off the war maneuvers despite the protest and denunciation of all Koreans and repeated warnings of the DPRK.
					
					 Whether the July 4 joint statement the keynote of which are the three principles of national reunification and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration the core of which is the idea of By Our Nation Itself are implemented or not is a yardstick discerning whether they are interested in mending the inter-Korean relations and settling the reunification issue or not.
					
					 But the puppet forces are repeating their bad habit of putting forward "new proposals", turning their faces away from the issue of implementing the north-south agreements whenever the regime is replaced by a new one in south Korea.
					
					 Whether they are interested in mending the inter-Korean relations and settling the reunification issue or not will be proved in practice, not with words.

articles.title: Action for Setting Free Prisoners of Conscience Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Setting Free Prisoners of Conscience Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Association for Supporting Workers Detained and other civic and public organizations and religious organizations in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on August 25 at which they declared an action demanding the release of prisoners of conscience.
					 Prisoners of conscience are those who were in actions for democratization of society and peaceful reunification, speakers said, adding they should be allowed to take part in the movement for peaceful reunification.
					
					 The prisoners of conscience are a product of the dictatorial rule, they noted, holding that those who should be imprisoned are forces who threw the prisoners of conscience into prison.

articles.title: Suppression of Pro-Reunification Activist Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Pro-Reunification Activist Assailed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued a statement on August 26 denouncing the puppet forces for cracking down on Rev. Han Sang Ryol.
					 Han visited Pyongyang in June, 2010 to take part in the events common to the nation marking the tenth anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration. The puppet group of traitors threw him into prison right after he crossed the demarcation line at Panmunjom, branding his just patriotic activities for reunification as criminal acts. After he was released after the three year-long prison life, the puppet forces have watched his movement by invoking the "law on supervision for public peace".
					
					 They arrested him once again on August 25 for the mere reason that he failed to inform of his movement under the law but were compelled to release him next day, pressurized by public opinion.
					
					 The statement said this evil law together with the "Security Law" should be abolished as they have been used to suppress the freedom of idea and conscience.
					
					 The current violence revealed only the absurdity of the "law on supervision for public peace", it charged.
					
					 It demanded the authorities abolish the law at once and discontinue the suppression of Rev. Han.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Sidestepping Issue of Instituting Special Law
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Sidestepping Issue of Instituting Special Law
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on August 26 denounced the puppet chief executive for turning her face away from the issue of instituting a special law on probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 It referred to the fact that the chief executive is misleading the public opinion by creating impression that opposition parties and bereaved families are to blame for failing to institute the law.
					
					 It accused her of sidestepping the issue despite the hunger sit-in being staged by bereaved families.
					
					 She promised to prevent the recurrence of such disaster but shifted the blame for it on the "National Assembly", taking a politically irresponsible attitude, it noted.
					
					 All these attitudes resulted from her incompetence, it said.

articles.title: Seminars on Songun Leadership Feats Held in Indonesia, India
articles.content:
Seminars on Songun Leadership Feats Held in Indonesia, India
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the Songun leadership feats were held in Indonesia and India on August 21 and 22 on the occasion of the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 Displayed there were photos dealing with the Songun leadership feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were people of different social standings of the relevant countries.
					
					 The secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia said in a speech:
					
					 The Korean people are significantly greeting August 25 every year as the day praising the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the DPRK firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity in the acute standoff with the U.S. and turned into a military power that the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces dare not provoke.
					
					 He is, indeed, the peerless brilliant commander who led the DPRK to victory by dint of Songun.
					
					 The director of a company of Indonesia said that the army and people of the DPRK could firmly defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country as Kim Jong Il pursued the Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India said that HE Kim Jong Un is providing ceaseless field guidance to units of the Korean People's Army under the unfurled banner of Songun, adding that only victory and glory are always set in store for socialist Korea having the great Songun brilliant commander.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked by Papers of India, Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked by Papers of India, Indonesia
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Papers of India and Indonesia carried articles on the occasion of the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 The Indian paper Indian and World Event in an article titled "Eternal chairman of National Defence Commission" on August 22 said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, he is the eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					
					 He established the state machinery with the NDC as its pivot and firmly guaranteed the Songun politics by law, providing the foundation for the eternal prosperity of the DPRK.
					
					 He, responsible for the destiny of socialist Korea, made sure that it directed all efforts to strengthening the military capability and intensified the overall national power on its basis.
					
					 The establishment of the state machinery with the NDC as its pivot helped bring about a great turn in socialist construction of the DPRK.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a military power with invincible military capability.
					
					 His feats will shine forever with the eternal prosperity of the DPRK.
					
					 The Indonesian paper Suara Karya on August 15 and another paper International Media on August 22 carried articles titled "By dint of Songun" and "Day of Songun in DPRK". The articles praised him for turning the Korean People's Army into the matchless army and the DPRK into a political and ideological power, satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state after starting the Songun revolutionary leadership 54 years ago.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by UK Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by UK Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Intensify the Anti-Imperialist, Anti-U.S. Struggle" on its website on Aug. 14. 
					 The work, published on August 12, Juche 56 (1967), clarifies the necessity to continue the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle, the position and role of the anti-imperialist and anti-colonialist struggle in the development of the world revolution, the main strategy of the world revolution and the ways for implementing it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Nigerian Paper, Cambodian Radio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Nigerian Paper, Cambodian Radio
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian paper and a Cambodian radio marked the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 The Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer on August 20 carried an article. It said: 
					
					 The Korean people are celebrating August 25, 1960 when leader Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership as the Day of Songun.
					
					 He trained the Korean People's Army to be a matchless army, bolstered up the military muscle of the country in every way with the KPA as a hardcore and thus provided a firm military guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 The KPA, which grew to be the elite army impeccable in the political and ideological, strategic and tactical, military and technological aspects under his care, has always won victories in the confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialist formidable enemies.
					
					 The eye-opening reality of the DPRK invincible with single-minded unity, strong with self-defence and prospering with the industrial revolution in the new century would be unthinkable apart from his Songun leadership feats.
					
					 The feats he performed by laying the eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and nation with his tested Songun leadership will remain shining with the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					
					 F. M. 90.5 Radio of Cambodia on August 19 introduced in detail his undying Songun leadership feats under the title "By dint of Songun".

articles.title: UK Organizations Support Statement of Spokesman for DPRK FM
articles.content:
UK Organizations Support Statement of Spokesman for DPRK FM
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association UK and other British progressive organizations made public a joint statement on August 18 in support of a statement issued by the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 There is no country in the world such as the DPRK being subject to a constant war threat for more than six decades. Any country has not been subject to all threats of war maneuvers for aggression of more than 18 000 times by the hostile forces against it.
					
					 It is a lie that Yankees are describing Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises as "annual and defensive ones".
					
					 UFG is aimed to invade the DPRK and realize the ambition for "change of the north's regime".
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' military exercises in south Korea are assuming more aggressive nature, and their scale, contents and form are going beyond those of military drills staged in the past.
					
					 The prevailing situation proves that the DPRK's new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force is, indeed, the only and just choice.
					
					 We fully support the statement issued by the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry which declared that if the U.S. continues staging nuclear war maneuvers to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, its counteraction for self-defense to cope with them will be put on an annual and regular basis.

articles.title: Russian Organization Condemns UFG
articles.content:
Russian Organization Condemns UFG
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK issued a statement on August 19 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for kicking off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 The statement said:
					
					 To achieve the reunification of Korea is in line with the interests of the people of all countries in Asia.
					
					 But the U.S. imperialists and south Korean conservative forces are kicking off the undisguised war maneuvers for aggression, UFG, against the DPRK under the pretext of "annual one", bringing a dark cloud of war to the sky above the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Regarding south Korea as a pawn on their chessboard, the U.S. imperialists are moving to ignite a war against the DPRK in league with south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces are working hard to unleash a war with the backing of the U.S. but the DPRK has the power enough to beat back the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will react to an all-out war in kind and reliably defend their socialist homeland.
					
					 We are convinced that if the U.S. imperialists ignite a war against the DPRK, the heroic Korean People's Army and people will certainly win victory in the spirit of a-match-for-a hundred under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Japanese Personage Denounces UFG
articles.content:
Japanese Personage Denounces UFG
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Kenki Nakamura, chairman of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, issued a statement on August 21 in protest against the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 UFG kicked off despite the strong opposition at home and abroad is a very dangerous military provocation, he said, demanding an immediate stop to it. He went on:
					
					 The U.S. described UFG as "defensive one" as it did in the past, but it is aimed to make a preemptive strike on the DPRK from A to Z, an unpardonable provocation.
					
					 What is more serious is that the "tailored deterrence strategy" the keynote of which is a preemptive nuclear strike is being formally applied to the drills for the first time. This clearly proves that the U.S. and south Korea are creating the crisis of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and threatening the peace in the region and the rest of Northeast Asia through their military nexus and nuclear blackmail.
					
					 The U.S. forces should be withdrawn from south Korea at once.
					
					 We strongly demand once again a halt to the dangerous UFG.
					
					 We are also determined to continue conducting the movement for the peace on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia in the future, too.

articles.title: Special Write-ups Posted by Foreign Organizations on Their Websites
articles.content:
Special Write-ups Posted by Foreign Organizations on Their Websites
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations posted special write-ups on their websites from August 17 to 21 on the occasion of the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted an article titled "Day of Songun in DPRK" illustrated with the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 August 25 is the day when HE Kim Jong Il, eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, started the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He inspected many units of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The KPA has grown to be the elite army under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, well versed in all sectors and fields of military affairs and possessed of the Juche-based military idea and theory, extraordinary insight and profound knowledge.
					
					 The feats he performed by laying the eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and nation with his outstanding and tested Songun leadership will shine long in history.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK edited an article praising the undying feats he performed by leading the confrontation with the U.S. to victory, illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship posted articles titled "By dint of Songun" and "U.S. hostile moves against DPRK" which said that August 25 is the significant day instilling the conviction of victory and courage into not only the Korean people making a long drive while shattering the moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK but also the world progressives struggling for independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de subunidades de infantes paracaidistas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de subunidades de infantes paracaidistas de EPC
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea dirigio los ejercicios de caida y golpe de blancos de las subunidades de los infantes paracaidistas del EPC.
					En el puesto de observacion, el Mariscal recibio el parte sobre el plan de los ejercicios y los dirigio.
					
					El se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que los paracaidistas cayeron exactamente en el punto fijado.
					
					Al guardar  profundamente lo que no pueden lograr la victoria en el combate sin sudar mucho en los ejercicios normales, los infantes  paracaidistas se entregaron al entrenamiento con el fervor de ejercicios del monte Paektu. Con este impetu pasaron de inmediato a las acciones siguientes de combate, cumpliendo asi la orden de ejercicios dada por el Mariscal.
					
					Tras evaluar altamente el que hayan realizado con exito los ejercicios  materializando los autoctonos metodos de combate, el Comandante Supremo les dio las instrucciones para perfeccionar los preparativos de combate del EPC.
					
					Sin ejercicios no pueden imaginar un fuerte ejercito y si los desprecian, traeran las consecuencias irrecuperables en los dias de batalla, dijo y agrego que el EPC debe acostumbrarse al entrenamiento y normalizarlo.
					
					Al tener presente que los ejercicios son precisamente el ejercito y el primero deber de los asuntos militares, las subunidades deben materializar estrictamente la orientacion del Partido de dar primordial atencion a los ejercicios, pensando siempre en la batalla, para formar a todos los  militares como verdaderos y multifuncionales combatientes especializados en todas las armas, dispuestos a combatir uno contra cien enemigos.
					
					Presento nuevo metodo y modo de ejercicios que serviran de guia en formar a los militares dispuestos a cumplir satisfactoriamente el deber de combate.
					
					Expreso una esperanza y confianza de que los oficiales y los soldados del EPC sigan concentrando las fuerzas en los preparativos de combate y el fortalecimiento de combatividad,  para asegurar con las armas el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la  construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Pyon In Son, O Kum Chol, Ri Pyong Chol, Pang Kwan Bok y Jang Tong Un.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Rusia
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Rusia
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- Segun un decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Hyong Jun fue designado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en la Federacion Rusa.

articles.title: En Pyongyang Kanji Inoki y su comitiva
articles.content:
En Pyongyang Kanji Inoki y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- Arribaron el dia 28 a esta capital Kanji Inoki, director jefe de la Asociacion de Comunidad de Deportes y Paz de Japon quien es senador y copresidente del comite organizador de la Competencia Internacional de Lucha Profesional de Pyongyang, y su comitiva, asi como los luchadores de varios paises quienes participaran en la competencia. 
					En el aeropuerto les recibieron Jang Ung, copresidente del mismo comite organizador y presidente del Comite Internacional de Juegos de Artes Marciales, y Ma Chol Su, secretario general de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Japon.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Juventud, tuvo lugar el dia 28 en la Casa Central de la Juventud la funcion del grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil "Cancion de la juventud que sigue al Sol".
					En la escena de la funcion se pusieron las piezas de diversos generos, entre otras, el solo masculino y pangchang "El lucero de Corea", himno revolucionario, la musica ligera "?Donde  esta el querido General?", obra maestra, el coro mixto "Defendamos a riesgo de la vida el Comite Central del Partido", etc.
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron las proezas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes por primera vez en la historia resolvieron satisfactoriamente el problema de la juventud. 
					
					El cuarteto masculino y pangchang "Jubilo de pueblo", el coro masculino "Tomaremos con mas firmeza los fusiles" y otras canciones reflejaron la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los jovenes coreanos de marchar a pasos firmes bajo la guia del Mariscal. 
					
					La funcion arranco efusivas ovaciones de los espectadores. 
					
					La vieron el presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, los funcionarios de la UJS y otros funcionarios correspondientes, jovenes y estudiantes.

articles.title: Jurista coreano comenta la discriminacion racial en EE.UU.
articles.content:
Jurista coreano comenta la discriminacion racial en EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente estadounidense Obama,  que hablaba tanto de los "derechos humanos", mantiene callado ante la muerte de los jovenes de su raza por el fusilazo de policia a plena luz en la calle.
					Asi dijo el investigador del Instituto Juridico de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Chae Mu Jin, y continuo:
					
					La sociedad internacional denuncia la severa discriminacion racial en el pais norteamericano.
					
					En Estados Unidos se desarrollan en ambito nacional las manifestaciones contra la discriminacion racial.
					
					Lo problematico es que ante ese incidente escandaloso estimado como una guerra civil por la opinion publica, Obama toma una actitud indolente.
					
					El, tras expresar "pesame" a los familiares del difunto dijo que ya sabe que el presente caso provoca la indignacion de la sociedad, pero, debe consolarse reciprocamente sin lesionarse mutuamente porque no se aclararon todavia los detalles del caso.
					
					?Que detalles mas deben ser aclarados? y ?Quien va a consolar a quien?
					
					Todo el mundo expresa gran indignacion por las palabras y acciones de Obama.
					
					Ahora, en mas de 100 ciudades estadounidenses se libran las acciones de protesta, en que derraman sangre los negros, pero, Obama, quien acusaba el problema de "DDHH" de otros paises, no suelta ni una palabra.
					
					El hecho comprueba que EE.UU. habla de "DDHH" para acusar a otros y Obama no pasa de ser un papagayo.
					
					El pueblo coreano no olvida que Obama, inhumano y pseudo politico, censura en el Sur de Corea junto con las escorias humanas los "DDHH" de alguien, y ajustara cuenta  de ello.
					
					Seria mejor que Obama, lacayo fiel a los enloquecidos en el racismo, absurdo "juez de DDHH" y presidente fantoche del imperio de exterminio de DDHH, baje siempre su cabeza descarada y sucia.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica disparates de autoridades surcoreanas sobre relaciones N-S
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica disparates de autoridades surcoreanas sobre relaciones N-S
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ACNC) -- La banda titere del Sur de Corea establecio el "comite preparatorio por unificacion", el "comite por economia y unificacion" y otros aparatos de padrino. Y al mismo tiempo, aboga por la "cooperacion en el ambiente, la cultura y la vida entre el Sur y el Norte", "plan principal para el desarrollo de relaciones Sur-Norte" y otros.
					Para colmo, dice que si se reanuda el dialogo Norte-Sur, "puede discutir cualesquier temas interesados por el Norte", mientras reprime a los habitantes que demandan la ejecucion de las declaraciones conjuntas aprobadas entre amabas partes coreanas, el cese de los ejercicios belicos de agresion al Norte, la anulacion de las "medidas del 24 de mayo" y la reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este jueves y continua:
					
					Quienes no conocen las verdaderas intenciones de las autoridades surcoreanas, pueden pensar como si ellas se esforzaran por la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la solucion del problema de reunificacion.
					
					Inducir asi la opinion publica interna y externa es precisamente el intento de la banda de titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Si la horda titere tiene de veras algun interes en la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la solucion del problema de reunificacion, debe parar los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de agresion al Norte librados en contubernio con Estados Unidos.
					
					La ruptura de las relaciones N-S se debe a  que los titeres surcoreanos desarrollan los entrenamientos belicos de agresion al Norte pese a la protesta y condena de todos los connacionales y a nuestra reiterada advertencia.
					
					Ejecutar o no la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio basada en los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre con el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", es la piedra de toque que distingue si tiene interes o no en la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la solucion del problema de reunificacion.
					
					Pero, cada vez que se cambie el "poder" en el Sur de Corea, se repite el mal habito de presentar "nuevas propuestas" dejando a un lado la ejecucion de los acuerdos aprobados ya por ambas partes.
					
					Si tiene interes en la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y la solucion del problema de reunificacion de la patria, la banda titere debe demostrar su voluntad no con sus palabras sino con las acciones practicas.
